greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If A327928(n) > 0, a(n) = A276086(n), otherwise a(n) = A003415(n).
comment: After zero, sequence contains only terms of A048103.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2310
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..65537
formula: If A327928(n) > 0 [when n is one of the terms in A327929], then a(n) = A276086(n), otherwise a(n) = A003415(n).
program: A276086(n) = { my(i=0,m=1,pr=1,nextpr); while((n>0),i=i+1; nextpr = prime(i)*pr; if((n%nextpr),m*=(prime(i)^((n%nextpr)/pr));n-=(n%nextpr));pr=nextpr); m; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 07 2019
